author: DAVID RYE
content:
YOUR George Washington was right – ‘Never underestimate your enemy’ !
Not forgetting Old Moore’s Almanac pre WW II – ‘The Yellow Man will rule the world.’
Time will tell – the longer the better.

author: Willy
content: Lame. Targeting in sandbox mode. No return fire, no defenses of any sort. At least the iranians made mockups. I would be more concerned about Iran over China.
